title: Public Testimony Flow
author: CivHub
description: A structured process for collecting and integrating public testimony into legislative decision-making.
steps: Public announcement of upcoming hearings and agenda.
Online or in-person signup for testimony slots.
Facilitated testimony sessions, with time limits enforced.
Real-time transcription and recording of testimonies.
Synthesis and reporting by committee staff.
recommended_tools: Zoom or other video conferencing software
